name: optional-date-pattern
description: Represents an optional BACnet date pattern, allowing either null or a date-pattern value.

options.name: null
options.description: Indicates the absence of a date pattern value.

options.name: datepattern
options.description: Specifies the BACnet date pattern value when present.
